title: IP Price Reduction - Runes are way too expensive in their current state
body: Runes are currently expensive, it is currently way too hard to get the runes I need for certain champions. Are there going to be any price reductions for Runes?

replies.body:
The main runes that Riot feel are "required" were given a permanent 50% price reduction.

AD Marks, Magic Pen Marks, Armour Seals, MR Glyphs, AP Quints and AD Quints.

Which I think is actually very good thing for them to do and lets be real here, they didn't need to do it.

We all know why runes are so expensive and can only be bought with IP. Riot want you to spend all your IP on runes and use RP to buy champions. Its that simple really.

So either, play more or pay more.

personally atk spe marks and quints should've been reduced also as they are required on most ad jglers and genrally better then ad marks on adcs

Honestly you can still get away with the AD Marks/Quints on junglers, and for some of them it really does benefit more then the AS.

AS tends to be either for champs that get some sort of benefit out of the AS (Master Yi, Graves) or champs that are AP/low auto damage (Amumu, Sejuani)

Runes are "expensive" as a way to curb people instantly going into ranked.

The idea is that people will take time to build up IP to buy the runes and doing so they'll have learned the game by the time they are ready to enter ranked with full sets of rune pages.

Yeh good one, we all know that doesn't happen. Players will get a stock standard rune page that will help both AD and AP and roll with it, hell, I have seen some who don't even have a full rune page going into Ranked because they spent all their points on getting champions to get past the pass mark.

Now if Runes on the other hand had a pass mark to stop them going into Ranked, different story.

Me on the other hand, I haven't brought any runes in years, I built up what I think is adequate for how I play, I have enough runes for FOUR full separate rune pages that will give me completely different runes on each page, basically all the good runes on each type. Now if I was to mix them up I could setup almost anything needed.

All I am missing is AS, GP5, HP, HP5, MP and all the per level and utility ones. AS would be handy, but I don't really need anything else.
